issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Tapping on headers does nothing on android,Iphone & gives a application error on windows phone. 

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(safari for iphone & IE for Windows Phone mango). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on Base UI tab.
6.Tap on the Views table row.
7.Tap on the Table Views table row.
8.Tap on the Header Table row.
9.Notice that nothing happens on iphone,android but gives application error page on windows phone mango.

Actual result:
1.Tapping on headers does nothing on android,Iphone & gives a application error on windows phone. 

Expected result:
1.Tap on each section on the resulting page.
2.Tapping on headers does nothing on android,Iphone & gives a application error on windows phone. 
3.Enter a valid string to search in the search field(eg: Al).
4.Only names containing Al should be listed In the view
fields.summary: MobileWeb: BaseUI-->Views-->TableViews-->Headers: Tapping on headers does nothing on Android, iPhone & gives a application error on windows phone
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206010843
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v2012060201244
Iphone 4
iOS Version : 4.3.5
Android 2.3.6
windows Phone Mango

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
